title: Reconecting to league browser
body:
After entering a game the reconnect icon popped up and as told I clicked cancel but when I moved to reconnect to the right one it moved out of my screen and even though it was still their I couldn't see it ,and after trying to restart my computer the browser for league won't pop up and after using the hrt it still won't work.

Can I have some help on this?

replies.body: Every time I want to play I hve to remove league files then download them again and sometimes it doesn't work right

Are you installing to the default locale? It's **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

Also, it sounds like a lot of your issues are tied to an *unstable connection*, so I'd really like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local network settings are configured properly for League.

Let me know if this caused any change.
Targons Blade I apreciate your help and because of that help I was able to solve this problem thank you very much

I am sorry I have seen the connection guide used the hrt and I have re-tried installing it and un stalling it again but it hasn't worked also whenever I try and get it updated it always says there is an error and 0 files scanned after a while
Did you clear off some space on your hard drive? Not having enough space to patch can definitely cause big issues.
Yes but that doesn't seem to be the case
How much free space is on your hard drive before you start patching?

559 mg of space 

I will free some up

I have tried this and it is installed into the locale but what is weird is that I have run out of memory so that could be it but I tried the hrt and it didn't seem to help because I recently installed something to help my connection and I don't think anything like that has occurred since then

I will try to get rid of some of my files I don't need

I will try this
  
Thank you

I have recently tried to reinstall it 3 times and each time my internet connection just for some reason went away ,and it keeps on telling me to reinstall the alpha client which I did in the hrt and the site for league
